name: NOG
description:
A goofy game made in a week for the Awful Holiday Jam 2018. Theme: Festive Spirits!

A nameless drunkard is lost on the streets after a hard Christmas day's work, and after an extended bender at the local bar he can barely find his way back home. Only you, armed with a fresh bottle of NOG, can entice this man into making his way there safe and sound.

  • Physics-based... "platforming" action!
  • A fully-articulated ragdoll that barely functions as a human being!
  • Minutes and minutes of endless fun!*

This is my first original "game", and my first entry to a game jam. It was tons of fun! Big thanks to everyone who helped put this on, and those in the Awful Jam Discord that gave feedback.

http://www.awfuljams.com/

*Mileage may vary... the controls are very goofy.
